name: Ikue Mori
description: {{nihongo|'''Ikue Mori'''|森 郁恵<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://tower.jp/artist/173938/Ikue-Mori|title=Ikue Mori - TOWER RECORDS ONLINE}}</ref>|Mori Ikue}} (born 17 December 1953), also known as '''Ikue Ile''', is a [[drummer]], [[electronic musician]], [[composer]], and [[graphic designer]]. Mori was awarded a "Genius grant" from the [[MacArthur Foundation]] in 2022.
